transcript.text: hi and welcome you listening to the x 22
report my name is dave and this is

january 7 2016 and the title of the

prepare let's get right into the
economic collapse financial news now out
in the UK we've already heard warnings
that this new retail season in 2016 is
not going to be good that people aren't
going to be spending their money because
they're going to be spending it on other
things well the UK is out there and
Britain's Treasury chief warned Thursday
of a dangerous cocktail of new threats
to the economy insisting that the
country's robust growth is not immune to

slowdown in China as well as dry as the
drop in the global stock market and
commodity prices are among the key
concern so basically what they're doing
at this point is they're warning
everyone that yeah the economy is ready
to implode here we will not be able to
keep going the way we've been going and
he went on to say that anyone who thinks
its mission is basically accomplished in
improving the economy in Britain is
making a grave mistake and that is one
thing I can agree on because what we are
seeing right now in the global economy
is that everything is starting to
implode and it is accelerating I mean
we've already seen where four days into

mean that this is the crash this is the
collapse know what this means is that
this market is starting to rip itself

it did prior to the crash of 2008 and of
course
bankers can they cannot let this happen
they cannot let this market come down on

what's really going on is completely

it's not because we've been tracking

actually we just realized that all the

63.6 in November it crashed a 49.9 in

it looks like Canada will be heading

yes can the Obama administration and the

yeah they can do that but again we have
to
member the manipulated number compared

and what we're seeing right now is a

everyone's employed this is what the

medicines thank
I have a little bit so i don't have to
